lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh picked up Manager John Russell’s contract option for 2010 despite the Pirates’ 67-95 record in his first season. “J. R. met or exceeded expectations in his first year as the Pirates’ manager,” General Manager Neal Huntington said. “His club worked hard to play the game properly and battled from the first out until the last.”.
